name: FIRST RESPONDER IX/XI
description:
The year is 2001, and tragedy has hit the United States.

Cloud Strife, a Firefighter and First Responder was simply living his life. After a ravaging fire on Main & South happened the day prior, Cloud had thought he had seen it all.

That was until it happened.

But who could have done this? And what would the suffering bring to the stability of the nation?

Cloud searches for answers, reunites with familiar faces, and more.

~ FAQ

What the hell is this?

- This is a fangame based on a t shirt i saw

You little shit, you think it's funny to make fun of such a terrible thing?

- This is in no way meant to be passed off as me trying to turn tragedy like 9/11 into a laughing stock. Expect to feel just as sad as you were on the day of the attack

Hey, this looks like shit!

- This is my first game, and this is just a demo right now. Expect the release date of anything final to be September 11th, 2022
